snippet.title: Shadow and Flame - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadow and Flame is Releasing soon!

Shadow and Flame is a modification for The Battle for Middle-earth 1. The mod's development was cancelled early 2017. Kwen and Spartan184 have picked the project back up and prepared it for a new release.

Shadow and Flame is an affiliate project of Age of the Ring (Many of the developers being the original creators of Shadow and Flame) therefore we have exclusive permission to utilize Age of the Ring content in the mod. We are not stealing, all work is property of their respective owner and they reserve the right to grant or revoke access at any time.

To keep up with the project, visit us here:

ModDB: https://www.moddb.com/mods/shadow-and-flame
Discord: https://discord.gg/MmjUmz3c4m
